casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Terry Jerome WILSON 295P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 1, 2017 Sterling Rozear, Attorney at Law, for Wilson, Terry Jerome. T. Hill Davis, III, Assistant Attorney General, Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of September 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of September 2017."
